DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate event-free survival patient peripheral primitive neuroectodermal tumor Ewing 's sarcoma treat cyclophosphamide , doxorubicin , vincristine , etoposide , ifosfamide , follow surgery ( feasible ) radiotherapy . II . Determine response uniform treatment regimen order clarify whether disease category different prognosis . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord disease category ( primitive neuroectodermal tumor v Ewing 's sarcoma ) . Patients receive treatment regimen A outlined course 1-3 6 regimen B outline course 4 , 5 , 7 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Each course last 3-4 week . Patients without metastatic disease completion course 3 undergo complete tumor resection , feasible . Patients achieve complete response without microscopic residual disease completion course 7 undergo radiotherapy twice daily , 5 day week , 3 week . Patients gross residual disease completion course 7 undergo radiotherapy twice daily , 5 day week , 3.6 week . Regimens A B define : Regimen A : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 6 hour day 1 2 , doxorubicin IV continuously vincristine IV continuously day 1-3 , vincristine IV day 9 . Regimen B : Patients receive etoposide IV 1 hour , follow immediately ifosfamide IV 1 hour day 1-5 . Patients follow monthly 18 month every 6 month 18 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 50 patient ( 25 per stratum ) accrue study within 5 year .
